about_the_game:
Someone may be confused about name ╮ (─ ▽ ─) ╭,
Split it: Keys In 1, Emmm.. 99 in 1 (`· ω · '), got it?

As the name implies, KeysIn1 is a software that can collect all softwares' hotkeys. When you using PS, Word, Unity or other softwares, is there any time to use a feature but spent a lot of time looking for where is it? Finally，it's just a simple hotkey to get it. (I often encountered during development... (╯ ° Д °) ╯ (┻ ┻).

Here, you can define your own hotkeys to display, from the mainstream to the niche softwares, as long as you want to do, it will be done (~ ~ ▽ ~) ~.

Of course, if you find it troublesome, you can download other people's products (* / ω \ *) from Workshop.And if you have also made an awesome set of hotkeys, you can also share it in the Workshop.

In the process of using, found any bugs, or have any suggestions, you can contact me via the Steam Community.
detailed_description:
Someone may be confused about name ╮ (─ ▽ ─) ╭,
Split it: Keys In 1, Emmm.. 99 in 1 (`· ω · '), got it?

As the name implies, KeysIn1 is a software that can collect all softwares' hotkeys. When you using PS, Word, Unity or other softwares, is there any time to use a feature but spent a lot of time looking for where is it? Finally，it's just a simple hotkey to get it. (I often encountered during development... (╯ ° Д °) ╯ (┻ ┻).

Here, you can define your own hotkeys to display, from the mainstream to the niche softwares, as long as you want to do, it will be done (~ ~ ▽ ~) ~.

Of course, if you find it troublesome, you can download other people's products (* / ω \ *) from Workshop.And if you have also made an awesome set of hotkeys, you can also share it in the Workshop.

In the process of using, found any bugs, or have any suggestions, you can contact me via the Steam Community.
name: KeysIn1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 32 bit
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32 & 64 bit)
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound

short_description: KeysIn1 provides you with more convenient experience when using softwares.You can also improve your productivity by sharing and downloading works on the Workshop.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
